author: Staff Reporter
text: A herd of nine elephants that was roaming in the forest close to Sugunapuram at Kovaipudur over the last three days damaged the compound wall of a private college on Saturday night. Forest department personnel said that the herd strayed out of the forest around 10.30 p.m. on Saturday and was chased back to the forest by the department personnel around 2 a.m. on Sunday.
title: Elephant herd damages wall
